issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Found this issue while looking at the method mentioned by HIVE-6648.

'alter table .. partition .. rename to ..' and other commands calling Warehouse.mkdirs() doesn't inherit permission on the partition directories and consequently the data, when "hive.warehouse.subdir.inherit.perms" is set.

Also, in these scenarios of directory creation, group is not being inherited.  Data files are already inheriting group by HIVE-3756.
fields.summary: Alter rename partition Perm inheritance and general partition/table group inheritance
